definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Fruit The ripened OVARY of a flower that is usually formed following fertilization of the ovule.
sentences.chinese: 顯花植物的成熟子房，通常是胚珠受精後形成。

sentences.english: Flowering plants were making their first appearance, but were still a rarity .
sentences.chinese: 顯花植物開始出現了，但仍然很少。
